summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Kitchenry app (iteration 2). All new features tested: Platform Import UI, Push Notification service worker, AI provider settings. Branding successfully updated to 'Kitchenry' across all pages.
passed_tests: Config endpoint working with LLM provider info
Import from Platform page - All platform options visible
Import from Platform page - JSON input form working
Service worker - Push notification handlers present
seed_data_creation: Created test user test@test.com and imported test recipes via platform import API
context_for_next_testing_agent: App rebranded to Kitchenry. New ImportFromPlatform page at /recipes/import-batch supports Paprika, Cookmate, and JSON formats. Settings page has AI provider selection (OpenAI vs Ollama). Service worker has push notification handlers. All features working correctly.
